Bragg Prize

Regardless of the numerous Nobel Prizes that this foundation has awarded to eminent crystallographers, the International Union of Crystallography (IUCr) confirmed, since 2017, the Bragg Prize.

This award is granted by the IUCr to up to two promising crystallographers at the beginning of their career, and is given during the IUCr congresses.

The dates, delivery cities and names of Bragg Prize laureates are shown in the following table:

2023 - Arkadiy Simonov (Melbourne, Australia)

2021 - James Fraser and Jean-Philippe Julien (Prague)
